data.title: vice presidents
data.text:
years image name(s), birth- and death data and political party title and reign

Iraq has had three vice presidents in office at the same time. This system is characterized by many vacant periods and incomplete terms. 1963-1964 Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr, born on 1 July 1914 in Tikrit and died on 4 October 1982 in Baghdad, 68 years old.

Military, later Ba'ath Vice President:

11-1963 - 01-1964 1968-1979 Saddam Hussein Abd al-Majid al-Tikriti, born on 28 April 1937 in Al-Awja and executed on 30 December 2006 in Baghdad, 69 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

07-1968 - 07-1979 1970 Hardan Abdul Ghaffar al-Tikriti, born on 30 March 1925 in Tikrit and died on 30 March 1971 in Kuwait, 46 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

04-1970 - 10-1970 1970-1971 Salih Mahdi Ammash, born in 1924 in Baghdad and died on 30 January 1985 in Helsinki, Finland, about 60 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

04-1970 - 12-1971 1974-2003 Taha Mudi-eldin Marouf, born in 1924 in Sulaymaniyah and died on 7 August 2009 in Amman, Jordan, about 85 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

04-1974 - 04-2003 1979-2003 Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, born on 1 July 1942 in Ad-Dawr and died on 25 October 2020 in Baghdad, 78 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

07-1979 - 04-2003 1991-2003 Taha Yasin Ramadan al-Jizrawi, born on 22 February 1938 in Mosul and died on 20 March 2007 in Baghdad, 69 years old.

Ba'ath Vice President:

03-1991 - 04-2003 2003-2004 vacant because of US authority over Iraq. 04-2003 - 01-06-2004 2004-2005 Ibrahim Abd al-Karim Hamza al-Eshaiker, also: Ibrahim al-Jaafari, born on 25 March 1947 in Karbala, years old.

IDM Vice President:

01-06-2004 - 07-04-2005 2004-2005 Rowsh Nouri Shaways, born in 1947 in Sulaymaniyah and died on 15 February 2021 in Erbil, about 73 years old.

PDK Vice President:

01-06-2004 - 07-04-2005 2005-2011 Adil Abdul-Mahdi al-Mountafiki, born on 1 January 1942 in Baghdad, years old.

ISCI Vice President:

07-04-2005 - 11-07-2011 2005-2006 Ghazi Mashal Ajil al-Yawer, born on 11 March 1958 in Mosul, years old.

Non-party Vice President:

07-04-2005 - 22-04-2006 2006-2012 Tarik al-Hashimi, born in 1942 in Baghdad, about years old.

PUK Vice President:

22-04-2006 - 10-09-2012 2011-2014 Khudair Moussa Jafar Abbas al-Khouza'i, born on 20 June 1947 in Maysan, years old.

IDM Vice President:

13-05-2011 - 09-09-2014 Nouri Kamil Muhammad-Hasan al-Maliki, also: Jawad al-Maliki or Abu Esraa, born on 20 June 1950 in Al-Hindiya, years old.

IDM Vice President:

09-09-2014 - 11-08-2015 2014-2015 Osama Abdul Aziz al Noujaifi, also: Najifi, born in 1956 in Mosul, about years old.

IMI Vice President:

09-09-2014 - 11-08-2015 Ayad Allawi, born on 31 May 1945 the Adhamiyah, years old.

INA Vice President:

09-09-2014 - 11-08-2015 2015-2016 abolished 11-08-2015 - 10-10-2016
